craterdog.security

Class Watermark

  • java.lang.Object
    • craterdog.smart.SmartObject<Watermark>
      • craterdog.security.Watermark
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    craterdog.core.Composite, Comparable<Watermark>

    public final class Watermark
extends craterdog.smart.SmartObject<Watermark>
    This class defines the attributes that make up a watermark that defines the lifetime of a document and the version of the signing algorithm used to sign it.
    Author:
    Derk Norton

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      org.joda.time.DateTime creationTimestamp
      The date and time that the document was created and became valid.
      org.joda.time.DateTime expirationTimestamp
      The date and time that the document will become no longer valid.
      int majorVersion
      The major version number of the implementation of the notary class used to sign the document.
      int minorVersion
      The minor version number of the implementation of the notary class used to sign the document.
      String signingAlgorithm
      The cryptographically secure signing algorithm that should be used to sign and verify all parts of a document.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Watermark() 

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class craterdog.smart.SmartObject

        addSerializableClass, addSerializableClass, compareTo, copy, equals, hashCode, toExposedString, toString, toString

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, finalize, getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • signingAlgorithm

        public String signingAlgorithm
        The cryptographically secure signing algorithm that should be used to sign and verify all parts of a document.

      • majorVersion

        public int majorVersion
        The major version number of the implementation of the notary class used to sign the document. The major version number changes when version of the notary class is incompatible with previous versions of the class for doing signing and verification.

      • minorVersion

        public int minorVersion
        The minor version number of the implementation of the notary class used to sign the document. The minor version number changes when new features are added, or bugs are fixed in previous versions of the class for doing signing and verification. All minor versions under the same major version should be compatible.

      • creationTimestamp

        public org.joda.time.DateTime creationTimestamp
        The date and time that the document was created and became valid.

      • expirationTimestamp

        public org.joda.time.DateTime expirationTimestamp
        The date and time that the document will become no longer valid.

      • Watermark

        public Watermark()
